mapper.update:
update tb_finance_income_month imonth
imonth.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
imonth.income_day = #{record.incomeDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imonth.income_type = #{record.incomeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imonth.income_typename = #{record.incomeTypename,jdbcType=INTEGER},
imonth.income = #{record.income,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
imonth.record_status = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
imonth.creator_account = #{record.creatorAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imonth.created_time = #{record.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
imonth.modifier_account = #{record.modifierAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imonth.modified_time = #{record.modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update tb_finance_income_month imonth set imonth.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, imonth.income_day = #{record.incomeDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imonth.income_type = #{record.incomeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imonth.income_typename = #{record.incomeTypename,jdbcType=INTEGER}, imonth.income = #{record.income,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, imonth.record_status = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, imonth.creator_account = #{record.creatorAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imonth.created_time = #{record.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, imonth.modifier_account = #{record.modifierAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imonth.modified_time = #{record.modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update tb_finance_income_month
income_day = #{incomeDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
income_type = #{incomeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
income_typename = #{incomeTypename,jdbcType=INTEGER},
income = #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
record_status = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
creator_account = #{creatorAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier_account = #{modifierAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
